Well, i have made my self into a spectacular bangs, and couple of comets, hahahahaha, and just couple of hours of playing.

Any advice on mods?

Search the Projects and Releases section at the forum home, but I would prefer you use Silisko edition at first. Its really balanced and adds a couple of useful parts so your rockets don\'t look ridiculous
